dct_description_sm: from a trigonometrical survey under the direction of F.R. Hassler and A.D. Bache, superintendents of the Survey of the Coast of the United States.
Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings.
Title in left lower margin: (Hempstead Harbor) U.S.C. & G.S. 366.
At head of title: United States Coast Survey.
"Electrotype copy no. 1 by G. Mathiot U.S.C.S."
